metadata.synopsis: One-line AD for when the door magically opens when a player carrying the Father Carrion's Letter gets close, beckoning them in.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the S_WYR_TriggerEntranceDoor trigger in BGO_Main_A with S_LOW_LetterFatherCarrion item in inventory (can be obtained with the ReCon command "oe LOW_GetLetterFatherCarrion"Location: BGO_Main_A, 26; 48; 142

0.context: InternalNodeContext: Is inviting player to "Enter" (just for clarity)NodeContext: Spooky undead drawl
